action.viewport.selection.transform_move: Transform: Reset offset of selected items
action.viewport.selection.transform_rota: Transform: Reset rotation of selected items
action.viewport.selection.transform_scal: Transform: Reset scale of selected items
setting.general.username.description: Your username that is used as author of projects created or edited by you
setting.general.streamermode.description: Toggle streamer mode to hide some sensitive info you may like to not be displayed
setting.general.streamermode.entries.des: Write down entries in comma separated list you wish to be hidden
setting.general.undolimit.description: Limit maximum entries stored in undo history. Set to -1 for unlimited. (may lead to decreased perfomance longer you work on a project)
setting.general.undoselection.descriptio: Decides whether to include selection of elements in undo history
setting.interface.hidetabbar.description: Hide tab bar when only 1 tab present to save on space. If 'OFF' tab bar will be visible with single tab. If 'ON' tab bar will be hidden if ther are less than 2 tabs open
setting.theme.colorthemetextdark.descrip: App darker text color. Usually reserved for descriptions and less important text
setting.theme.colorthemeaccentbright.des: App brighter accent color. Usually reserved for highlighting and text shadows of already accented items
